component.name: H05 Modular Headphones
component.summary: Firmware for the AIAIAI H05 bluetooth device

description.p: Updating the firmware on your H05 improves performance and adds new features.
The following bugs have been fixed:

ul.li: Volume up and down can now be pressed quickly
Bluetooth device renamed to AIAIAI TMA-2 (H05)
Fix an issue where the headband could not turn on again
Fix an issue where LED would turn off, while still being connected
H05 will only attempt to reconnect to last paired device at power on
